methodology.problem: Pluang has no dedicated product feedback channel. There is no in-app feedback form, no NPS survey, no feature request tracker, and no structured product feedback loop. Product feedback is scattered across support tickets, Play Store reviews, bot complaints, and search utterances — all mixed in with operational support requests.

dataSources.name: Salesforce Items__c field
dataSources.detail: Primary signal. Each ticket has an Items__c classification set by agents during resolution. 120+ unique Items__c values, mapped to product feedback themes. Example: "Face Verification Failed" = product issue, "Inquiry Cashout General" = support request

dataSources.name: Salesforce Sub_Category field
dataSources.detail: Secondary signal. "Features & Suggestions" (1,990 tickets) = explicit product feedback. "Login", "Keep loading", "Basic Verification" = implicit product issues

dataSources.name: Play Store Review Queue
dataSources.detail: Reviews ingested into SF as tickets for agent response. Categorized via Items__c: "Feedback Playstore" (605), "Feedback" (583)

dataSources.name: In-App Feedback
dataSources.detail: Feedback submitted through in-app mechanisms. Sources: In-App (461), Live Chat (65), Email (46)

dataSources.name: Low App Rating Signal
dataSources.detail: Auto-created from In-App when user rates app poorly. 100% from In-App channel, all categorized as "Features & Suggestions"

dataSources.name: Bot Intent Classification
dataSources.detail: LLM-classified intents: "complaint" (155), "account_issue" (600+). Provides sentiment signal but limited volume

themeRules.rule: Items__c contains 'Face Verification', 'Basic Verification', 'NIK Already', 'Invalid Selfie', 'Reverification'
themeRules.exampleItems: Face Verification Failed (5,440), NIK Already Registered (913), Inquiry Basic Verification (520)
themeRules.confidence: HIGH — specific Items__c values directly map to product failures

themeRules.rule: Items__c contains 'Change Phone Number', 'Account Deactivation/Activation', 'Delete Inactive Bank', 'Reset Authenticator', 'Change Username'
themeRules.exampleItems: Change Phone Number - Registered Number Inactive (1,759), Wrong Input (814), Pluang Account Deactivation (766)
themeRules.signalType: Product Gap — features users need but can't self-serve
themeRules.confidence: HIGH — these are self-service features that don't exist

themeRules.rule: Items__c contains 'Cashout', 'BCA Refund', 'BCA Name', 'BCA Amount', 'BCA Non Bank', 'BCA Different'
themeRules.exampleItems: BCA Name Not Unique (2,303), BCA Different Bank Name (754), BCA Non Bank Transfer (388)
themeRules.signalType: Product Issue — BCA integration failures + unclear status
themeRules.confidence: HIGH — BCA-specific items indicate systematic integration issues

themeRules.rule: Items__c contains 'App Login', 'Inquiry Login', 'Forgot PIN', 'OTP', 'PIN', 'Can't Access'
themeRules.exampleItems: App Login Issue (927), Inquiry OTP/PIN (729), Inquiry Login (519)
themeRules.confidence: HIGH — login failures are product defects, not support questions

themeRules.exampleItems: New Device Verification General (617), New Device Manual Verification (496)
themeRules.signalType: Product Issue — device detection creates unnecessary friction
themeRules.confidence: HIGH — auto-created tickets indicate product-generated workload

themeRules.exampleItems: Inquiry Top Up Others (466), Inquiry Top Up General (267), Inquiry Top Up QRIS (262)
themeRules.signalType: Mixed — some product failures, some user confusion
themeRules.confidence: MEDIUM — mix of failed transactions and inquiry

themeRules.rule: Items__c = 'Feedback Playstore' or 'Feedback' AND origin = 'Play Store'
themeRules.confidence: HIGH — explicit user feedback, but unstructured text

themeRules.exampleItems: Feedback (581 tickets across In-App, Live Chat, Email)
themeRules.confidence: MEDIUM — mixed quality, some are actual feedback, some are support requests miscategorized

themeRules.rule: Items__c = 'Low App Rating' or 'Keep Loading Issue'
themeRules.exampleItems: Low App Rating (381), Keep Loading Issue (31)
themeRules.confidence: HIGH — Low App Rating is auto-detected; Keep Loading is user-reported

themeRules.signalType: Product Issue — security vulnerabilities or perception issues
themeRules.confidence: HIGH — security incidents are product-level concerns

exclusions.label: Unclassified
exclusions.reason: Items__c = "Unclassified" — METHODOLOGY GAP. If 10-20% contain product feedback, that's 900-1,800 missing signals.

exclusions.label: Inquiry-only items
exclusions.reason: General questions ("Inquiry about Pluang", "About Pluang") — not product feedback

exclusions.label: Ops items
exclusions.reason: Agent-side operational tasks ("Ops Checking Others") — not user-generated feedback

limitations: 15% unclassified — 8,860 tickets have Items__c = "Unclassified", potentially hiding product feedback
No sentiment scoring — Items__c tells us WHAT the issue is, not HOW the user felt about it
Agent classification bias — themes depend on what agents enter in Items__c, which may be inconsistent across agents
No feedback loop — there is no mechanism to route product feedback themes back to product teams
Play Store reviews are unstructured — 1,188 reviews are marked "Feedback Playstore" or "Feedback" with no further categorization of WHAT the feedback was about
Bot complaints uncategorized — 155 chat messages classified as "complaint" but no sub-categorization of what product feature the complaint targets

data.topItems: Change Phone# Inactive (1,759), Wrong Input (814), Acct Deactivation (766), Change Phone# Already Registered (684)
Face Verification Failed (5,440), NIK Already Registered (913), Inquiry Basic Verification (520)
BCA Name Not Unique (2,303), BCA Different Bank Name (754), BCA Non Bank Transfer (388)
App Login Issue (927), Inquiry OTP/PIN (729), Inquiry Login (519)
Inquiry Top Up Others (466), Inquiry Top Up General (267), Inquiry Top Up QRIS (262)
New Device Verification General (617), New Device Manual Verification (496)

data.sources: EmailCase: 282 | L1 Agent: 95 | Live Chatbot Case: 15
data.topItems: Unauthorized Activity (311), Account Hack (63), Security & License (31)
Low App Rating (381), Keep Loading Issue (31)

themes.insight: 30,704 tickets (52.1%) map to identifiable product feedback themes. The remaining 48% are either operational support, spam/duplicate (7.4%), unclassified (15%), or general inquiries. The two fastest-growing themes — Face Verification (+346%) and App Stability (new, 241 in Jan) — both emerged AFTER the Help Center launch and correlate with new app features, not support channel changes.

overview.trendNote: Volume falling — BUT this could mean: (1) Fewer users leaving reviews (reduced engagement signal), (2) Improved app quality (positive signal), (3) Review ingestion pipeline issues (data quality signal)

playStore.insight: 63.4% of Play Store reviews have no actionable categorization. "Feedback Playstore" and "Feedback" as Items__c values tell us nothing about WHAT the user is saying. These 1,188 reviews are ingested, assigned to agents, and closed — but the actual product feedback content is never extracted, categorized, or routed to product teams.

gap.title: MISSING: Play Store Review Sentiment Analysis
items: Extract star ratings (available in Play Store API but not stored in SF)
Categorize review topics (what feature/issue the review discusses)
Track review-to-response time (how fast agents reply to reviews)
Measure response impact (does agent reply change user's rating?)
Route negative reviews to product teams for trend analysis
gap.note: 12,385 total Play Store reviews exist, but only 1,875 made it into SF as tickets. The other ~10,500 are not tracked at all.

faceVerification.title: Face Verification / KYC — 700 → 3,121 tickets (+346%)
faceVerification.primaryItem: Face Verification Failed — 5,440 tickets (71.8% of theme)
topSubItems: Face Verification Failed: 5,440 (user's face scan rejected by system)
NIK Already Registered: 913 (national ID already used — possible duplicate or fraud)
Inquiry Basic Verification: 520 (users asking how to verify — confusing UX)
faceVerification.productImplication: Face verification is a PRODUCT issue, not a support issue. The system rejects users, they create tickets, agents manually verify. This is 12.9% of all support volume caused by a single product feature. Fix: improve face detection algorithm, add real-time feedback during scan ('move closer', 'better lighting'), auto-retry before creating ticket.
faceVerification.costEstimate: 7,580 tickets × ~10 min avg agent time = ~1,263 agent-hours/period. If face verification success rate improved from current to 90%+, est. 5,000+ tickets eliminated.

appStability.title: App Stability — 1 → 241 tickets/month (emerged Dec 2025)

composition.note: Auto-detected in-app low ratings — ALL from In-App channel
User-reported loading issues — Play Store + EmailCase

appStability.insight: Low App Rating (381) is an auto-detection signal that ONLY appeared in Dec/Jan. Either: (a) the detection mechanism was newly implemented, or (b) app quality degraded. The timing correlates with HC launch and new app features. Either way, this is a leading indicator — 241 low ratings in January alone.
appStability.recommendation: Investigate: When was the Low App Rating auto-detection mechanism deployed? If new, this is a data collection improvement. If existing, the 157→241 growth indicates real app quality degradation that needs engineering attention.

accountManagement.title: Account Management — Largest theme, steadily growing

topIssues.item: Change Phone Number - Registered Number Inactive
topIssues.note: User's old phone number no longer works — can't receive OTP
Users entering incorrect data during account operations
Users wanting to deactivate accounts — no self-service option

topIssues.item: Change Phone Number - New Number Already Registered
topIssues.note: Migration path blocked — new number used by another account
Users can't manage their own bank accounts
Users who forgot their old credentials
Username change not available in app

accountManagement.productImplication: 8,653 tickets from users trying to manage their own accounts. Every single one of these is a self-service feature that doesn't exist in the app. Phone number change alone is 4,482 tickets (7.6% of ALL support volume). This is the highest-ROI product investment: build self-service account management and eliminate 8,000+ tickets/period.
accountManagement.recommendation: Priority self-service features to build: (1) Phone number change with identity verification, (2) Account deactivation/reactivation flow, (3) Bank account management, (4) Authenticator reset, (5) Username change

spam.note: Spam emails auto-created as tickets — pure noise

duplicate.note: Duplicate Ticket items — already counted in merge analysis

unclassified.impact: CRITICAL — 15% of tickets have no Items__c classification. This is the largest single data quality issue. If even 20% of unclassified tickets contain product feedback, that's 1,772 missing signals.

recommendations.detail: 8,860 tickets (15%) have Items__c = 'Unclassified'. Enforce mandatory Items__c selection before ticket close. Current classification happens during resolution — move it to triage so it's captured even if ticket is quick-closed.
recommendations.impact: Recover ~1,800 product feedback signals per period

recommendations.detail: 1,188 Play Store reviews are tagged 'Feedback Playstore' or 'Feedback' with no topic classification. Add a mandatory sub-topic field: App Performance, Feature Request, Pricing Complaint, Bug Report, Positive Feedback.
recommendations.impact: Make 1,188 reviews actionable for product team

recommendations.detail: Currently, ALL feedback stays in CS. No mechanism to route product issues to product/engineering teams. Build a weekly digest that surfaces top themes + trend changes to product managers.
recommendations.impact: Close the feedback loop — CS data becomes product input

recommendations.detail: There is no structured feedback form in the app. Users who want to give feedback must either write a Play Store review, contact support, or submit In-App 'Feedback' (which gets mixed with support requests). Add a dedicated feedback form with category selection.
recommendations.impact: Separate product feedback from support requests at source

recommendations.detail: No satisfaction survey exists for resolved product issues. Add a post-resolution NPS question for product-related tickets (Face Verification, Login, Account Management) to measure if the product fix actually helped.
recommendations.impact: Create closed-loop measurement: issue detected → fix shipped → satisfaction measured
